session.stepp-1: Generate an OTP for your primary device
session.stepp-2: Enter the OTP on your secondary device
session.stepp-3: Confirm the session merge on your secondary device
session.help-body:
The polls and votes you create on this site are bound to the session of the device they are created on.
This can be a problem if you want to use JaWannDennJetzt on multiple devices.
For instance, if you create a poll on one device (let's call it the primary device), you wont' be able to edit / close / delete it on any other device (let's call these devices secondary devices).
session.help-body-2:
To solve this problem, this page offers you the option to merge sessions of multiple devices into one shared session.
By merging the sessions, a secondary device will automatically have access to the polls / votes of the primary device (and vice versa).
session.do-not-share: ‚ö†Ô∏è Never share this token with anyone else ‚ö†Ô∏è
session.token-valid-until:
The token is valid until { valid_until } and can
only be used ONCE!
session.submit-help: Please enter the OTP form your primary device
